name: "Fragments of Innocence"
description:
Specialized refinement material for "Dodoco Tales."
Pages scattered on the wind. Each one is filled to the brim with childlike wonder, and their dimensions are an exact match for "Dodoco Tales." The abundant innocence and pure love therein will never fade, and just like the never-ending adventure in the book â€” this passionate fairy tale shall forever soar in the wake of the author's footsteps.
